name: The Last Hope (itch) (YonLN)
description:
With the selfish activities of humanity, the destruction of the Earth has come sooner than expected. However, our hero, a simple gardener, has one of the most important jobs, to ensure that nothing is lost. A simple, weak and vulnerable organism that can be the key to the reversion of our home is found and needs to be protected at all cost with the minimum equipment at hand. Our last hope…is you….

How to play:

Movement - WASD / ARROW KEYS

Attack - Space

Goal:

Keep the flower alive, if it gets damaged heal it with your attack.

You can refill at the nearest water source.
